definition: contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: So we have first, a reversible process.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們有，首先，一個可逆反應。

sentences.english: Finally, typical applications of retroreflectors and retroreflecting materials are given.
sentences.chinese: 最後列舉了逆反光材料的應用。

sentences.english: We will live a counter-cultural life that is attractive to others.
sentences.chinese: 過一種能吸引他人的逆反文化的生活。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the cyclic Voltammetry curve of gingerol indicated that the reaction was half reversible process.
sentences.chinese: 薑辣素的循環伏安掃描曲線表現爲準可逆反應。

sentences.english: The results show that the reaction can be considered as a second-order irreversible reaction.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明該反應爲二級不可逆反應。

sentences.english: Finally, the effects of reversible reaction to the isotope enrichment was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 最後研究了逆反應對同位素濃縮過程的影響。

sentences.english: College students psychology of aversion is a big problem in campus security work.
sentences.chinese: 大學生的逆反心理給校園保衛工作帶來了很大的影響。

sentences.english: Excessive parental control also leads to resistance and even rebellion.
sentences.chinese: 父母親過多的控制也導致孩子的逆反和叛亂。

sentences.english: My experience is not deliberately to train him, make him have a reverse psychology.
sentences.chinese: 我的經驗是不要刻意的去訓練他，使他產生逆反心理。

sentences.english: The reversible reaction appeared on grain boundary surface quite markedly.
sentences.chinese: 晶界的這種可逆反應十分明顯。

sentences.english: People with strong negative mentality tend to deem himself as a victim.
sentences.chinese: 有強烈逆反心理的人容易將自己視爲受害者。

sentences.english: The reverse of Reaction 11 for acetate may be combined with the electron acceptor reactions.
sentences.chinese: 的逆反應可以與電子接受體反應組合在一起。

sentences.english: So the thermodynamics feasibility of reverse reaction sintering is demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 論證了逆反應燒結的熱力學可行性。

sentences.english: Under the condition of dissociation the irreversibility was easily to occur.
sentences.chinese: 當有離解作用存在時，將伴隨有不可逆反應發生。

sentences.english: Later on, we will talk about reversible reactions.
sentences.chinese: 等一會我會討論可逆反應。

sentences.english: The results showed that the synthesizing process was an instantaneous and irreversible reaction.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，該合成過程爲瞬間不可逆反應。

definition: to let sb do whatever they want/to indulge/to give free reins to/to let things slide/to drift aimlessly/laissez-faire
to disobey/to defy an edict/to violate/to go against/to run counter to
when things reach an extreme, they can only move in the opposite direction (idiom)
